function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact on mental health due to COVID-19, including economic instability, domestic violence, and fear among healthcare workers","Impact":"Increased mental health issues and strain on healthcare workers, leading to decreased overall wellbeing","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, counseling, and resources for individuals and healthcare workers","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps, online counseling services","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Economic instability, decreased conservation efforts, and plummeting economy due to COVID-19","Impact":"Threatened global animal species, decreased funding for conservation efforts, and economic downturn","Mitigation":"Increase support for conservation efforts, economic recovery initiatives, and sustainable practices","Technologies":"Remote monitoring technology, conservation drones, sustainable economic strategies","People":"Conservationists, general population","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government, environmental agencies"}]}
